net.netnook.repeg

Interface Expression

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Visitable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CompoundExpression, SimpleExpression
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CharacterExpression, Choice, EndOfInput, ExpressionBase, FloatExpression, NewlineExpression, Optional, Predicate, Repetition, Rule, Sequence, StringExpression

    public interface Expression
extends Visitable
    Common interface for expressions. All expressions used in this library must implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String buildGrammar()
      Build the grammar for this expression.
      boolean parse(RootContext context)
      Parse the next input characters as indicated by the context and return whether or not the expression matches.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.netnook.repeg.expressions.Visitable

        accept

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        boolean parse(RootContext context)
        Parse the next input characters as indicated by the context and return whether or not the expression matches.

        If a match has occurred (i.e. when this method returns true), the context must have been moved to the first character following the match. An expression may optionally add or manipulate elements on the stack held by the context. A well behaved expression should however never attempt to modify any stack contents not resulting from itself or any of it's descendent expressions.

        If no match occurred (i.e. when this method returns false, the input position and stack must be considered invalid by the caller. It is the caller's responsibility to reset the input position and stack (via the context) such that parsing may resume at the required point.

        Parameters:
        context - parsing context.
        Returns:
        true if match successful, false otherwise

      • buildGrammar

        java.lang.String buildGrammar()
        Build the grammar for this expression.
        Returns:
        grammar.
